Blog.post: I looked back on my past I remembered the years i cried The jokes i laughed at The things that i missed and lost But one thing that i'll never forget The day you became my friend All the time I've spent with you Puts a smile upon my face I hope one day I'll be with you again Somehow, sometimes, someplace.... A friend will come and a friend will go The season will change and time will show But one thing that will never gonna change The spirit of friendship! And still I hope that you'll be there for me And I'll be there for you Sometime... someplace my friend!
urlLink check your power of observation urlLink

... nice comment bebe! thank you for taking a look at my work... well what can i say..? lets enjoy life with a lie! if thats the way to enjoy then lets do it! hahaha! but not overdoing it coz it wont be fun anymore.... i think thats why there is such a word as white lie... a lie not to hurt someone... a lie with a good intention... that makes sense is it...?

yehey! at last i did it! i was able to post my pic..... congratulations to me! With time , dedication and patience to learn i got it! but this is only the beginning ... i feel i like to learn and do more.... kudos!

for today, since i left the house late because i got crazy over this page, i did a little work but i was a good samaritan to a new med rep in the territory who happens to be a former officemate. He is new to the job so i gave him tips and oriented him in the territory... showing him the different clinics and hospitals as well as fixing his masterlist...extending help to anyone is always a pleasure for me... And most of all, the problem i got yesterday with my sister is okay now.She texted me and reassured me that she talked to mom already and everythings fine. God heard my prayers.....

wow! this is not really easy after all..... finally! got what i w anted to achieve for the day... tried how to post a pic but im not successful yet... downloaded the hello coz the site said its one way of posting a pic here... anyway, i will explore it next time... coz this time, i need to go back to my other world the real world..... meaning ..i have to get up now and work!lol ! patience, time and enough resources get you where you want to be...

i'm still lost...filled up my profile but when i checked on my site my 1st posting was not there.. im trying to learn also how to add pic ... this blog thing is making my ass stick on this computer chair.... i have attempted to leave minutes ago but i kept on coming back till i get it right... hope this time i will..... learning... is not an easy way... moral lesson.... bettter things come the hard way..... its called life....

wow! im getting also addicted to this.... but got a hard time registering a name..... the names i preferred was not available and undercore was not allowed i was wondering why..??? coz bebe got an underscore on his name... anyway, i just found one... corect spelling of my name..maybe they dont want my name spelled backwards....lol hmmmm... ... this is eating my time and attention... again, its always exciting and fun learning new things!thank you again bebe!
